text: incision and drainage with bolster dressing placement of right ear recurrent auricular hematoma
context:
title of procedure:
incision and drainage with bolster dressing placement of right ear recurrent auricular hematoma.

postoperative diagnosis:
recurrent severe right auricular hematoma.

text: xylocaine 1% with 1:100,000 dilution of epinephrine totaling 2 ml
context:
anesthesia:
xylocaine 1% with 1:100,000 dilution of epinephrine totaling 2 ml.
the area was prepped in the usual manner, localized and the previous incision was reopened with a curved hemostat and about 5 ml of serosanguineous drainage was noted.
the patient underwent an incision and drainage procedure with stay suture placement on 05/28/2008 by me and also by dr. x on 05/23/2008 for a large near 100% auricular hematoma.
